doc:
George Tobias https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Tobias 0 George Tobias (July 14, 1901 – February 27, 1980) was an American film and television actor. He had character parts in several major films of Hollywood's Golden Age, but today he is probably best known for his role as Abner Kravitz on the TV sitcom Bewitched. George_Tobias ( July_14_,_1901 – February_27_,_1980 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . He had character_parts in several_major_films of Hollywood 's_Golden_Age , but today he is_probably_best_known for his_role as Abner_Kravitz on the_TV_sitcom Bewitched .
